m_szDocTitle: News Corp Staff Get Deals On Plug-In Hybrids And Rooftop Solar
m_szDocSumamry: August 20th, 2015 by Guest Contributor   Originally published on RenewEconomy . By Sophie Vorrath Rupert Murdoch’s Australian mastheads are not exactly known as champions of green energy or climate policies, but a new deal between News Corp Australia and car maker Mitsubishi could see them lead the charge for green driving. According to an email from News Corps “Environmental Sustainability Initiative”, Mitsubishi is offering News full time permanent staff a heavily discounted 12 month lease on its hybrid electric Outlander, the world’s first plug-in hybrid SUV.
